Reviews.Title: Dell  Inspiron 15R
Reviews.Author: Susie Que "Deb"
Reviews.Content: Amazon's shipping of this was done quickly. ackaging was too large of a box with not enough protection around it. The design of this computer has a lot to be desired. It is difficult to open. It takes 2 hands to do adjustments to the sound and the speed of a movie where my other one only took one hand to push a button on the front of the computer. I don't like Windows 8 which I upgraded to Windows 8.1. I called for help from Dell and they set my computer to open up on Microsoft instead of just unlocking it. I don't like that. I have my own copy of Office which it won't let me install because it came with a 30 day free trial so it always reverts back to that.

Reviews.Title: The SELLER-bestelectronicdeal sold me a PRE_OWNED computer as new
Reviews.Author: BFair
Reviews.Content: The laptop came with windows 8 and won't be able to update to windows 8.1. I called Dell tech support and found out the service tag is under someone else's name, which means I got a pre-owned laptop. Called amazon and got a refund immediately. Will not buy anything from the seller-- bestelectronicdeal again.

Reviews.Title: Suspect that it's used, and not new.
Reviews.Author: TAH
Reviews.Content: The computer is okay. Just okay. It is advertised as new but I have reason to believe it may be pre-owned.1. The package had some obvious signs of stickers that were torn off.2. The laptop shipped with the battery attached (Not normal. Manufacturers don't do this.)3. I was unable to browse to Dell's site, despite other computers on my network having no problems. It can browse to all other sites. This is generally a result of someone editing the HOSTS file on the computer for certain domains.I am a computer administrator and all of these things added up is enough to make me more than suspicious. I am returning the machine.

Reviews.Title: Excellent home computer at reasonable price (on sale)
Reviews.Author: BobWeiss
Reviews.Content: Great improvement in speed over my prior DELL with Vista. Windows 8 is confusing even though  I have long Windows experience, but after 2-3 days I learned how to find the features I needed. Good quality sound which I value because I play internet radio constantly in the background. So far, no major problems found.

Reviews.Title: Solid value
Reviews.Author: J. Messerli
Reviews.Content: Ease to use and efficient.  Windows 8.1 isn't so bad once you get past a few quirks on initial use.  Touch screen is nice when you're sitting in a chair with the laptop on your legs.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: jose Quezada
Reviews.Content: Bell computer, desing amazing for finishing aluminum and also very fast, I found myself very wellI recommend it to all for this price.Great Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: shirley wilson
Reviews.Content: Perfect for me! Love the speed and ease of use. Once it was set up I have had no problem with windows 8.1

Reviews.Title: best computer I've ever owned!
Reviews.Author: Vickie D. Stewart
Reviews.Content: Love this computer... nothing but GOOD! Dude get a dell! You won't be sorry with this model...I will be back!

Reviews.Title: Good laptop
Reviews.Author: Rajkarthik
Reviews.Content: The laptop works very well. The only concern I have is it doesn't have keyboard backlight. Except this, everything looks good with the laptop. Its amazing.

Intel Core i5-4200U Processor 1.6 GHz
8 GB DDR3L SDRAM
1 TB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Touchscreen Display
